data.title: Shell investor & media
data.description: Shell’s Investor & Media app gives you our latest news, tweets, share prices, information on forthcoming events, our strategy & bonds & credits information. You’ll be able to access our most recent quarterly results including live & archived webcasts, read annual publications including our sustainability report & investor fact sheet, watch.

data.title: Example title #1
data.description:
An inventive use of video, animations, photos, & sound help the user go inside energy. – Chris Hauk, Mactrast.com

INSIDE ENERGY lets you explore interactive stories on innovation & the energy powering our lives. Discover new ways of finding energy, learn about advances in technology, & meet the people involved in making it happen. New stories & interactive features are regularly added.

This Shell app opens a window onto the creative ways energy can be produced, & used.

Find out, for example, how tiny threads of glass are helping to produce energy.

Meet students who have designed a car that travels a distance equivalent to going from Paris to Moscow on a single litre of fuel.

See inside the stove that is helping millions of the world’s poorest to breathe cleaner air, & hear from some of the people whose lives have improved.

If you have questions or feedback on the INSIDE ENERGY app, then please email us at insideenergy@shell.com.

data.title: Shell Lubricants
data.description:
The Shell Lubricants app allows you to find the best lubricants for your vehicle or equipment. Features include:

- Shell LubeMatch lubricant recommendations
- Quick access to 'Last Searched' vehicles and equipment
- Ability to share recommendations
- Saving vehicles & equipment to your 'Favourites'
- Access to the latest news and promotions
- Handy torch functionality for devices with LED flash

NOTE: For best user experience we recommend using the Shell Lubricants app while connected to WiFi
